text: Lin Chang-lun (; born 28 June 1991) is a Taiwanese footballer who currently plays as a forward at the national and club level. Lin is a member of the Amis people and has served in the armed forces, although he cut his time short in the army to focus on his football career. ==International goals== {| class="wikitable" .Scores and results are list Taiwan's goal tally first. |- !
